Title: Relates to certifying certain professionals as emergency service technicians to service rural areas
Summary: Allows certain certified registered nurse anesthetists, nurse practitioners, physician assistants or physicians to be able to be certified as an emergency service technician to service rural areas of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง3002, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to certifying certain professionals as emergency service technicians to service rural areas
